text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus luteocarneus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 3 to 5 centimetres (1.2 to 2.0 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus luteocarneus grows solitary to scattered, on conifer logs. It has been found in California in November.
